hr99-113.official_title: To prohibit anticompetitive activities and to provide that health insurance issuers and medical malpractice insurance issuers are subject to the antitrust laws of the United States, and for other purposes.
hr99-113.short_title: Health Insurance Industry Antitrust Enforcement Act of 2013

hr98-113.official_title: To provide a remedy for survivors and descendants of the victims of the Tulsa, Oklahoma Race Riot of 1921.
hr98-113.short_title: John Hope Franklin Tulsa-Greenwood Race Riot Claims Accountability Act of 2013

hr97-113.official_title: To provide incentives for States to invest in practices and technology that are designed to expedite voting at the polls and to simplify voter registration.
hr97-113.short_title: Fair, Accurate, Secure, and Timely Voting

hr96-113.official_title: To permit the televising of Supreme Court proceedings.

hr95-113.official_title: To reduce Federal spending and the deficit by terminating taxpayer financing of presidential election campaigns and party conventions.

hr94-113.official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prohibit the use of public funds for political party conventions.

hr93-113.official_title: To amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to restrict the ability of a person whose Federal license to import, manufacture, or deal in firearms has been revoked, whose application to renew such a license has been denied, or who has received a license revocation or renewal denial notice, to transfer business inventory firearms, and for other purposes.

hr92-113.official_title: To provide energy crisis relief to residents of the Virgin Islands.
hr92-113.short_title: Virgin Islands Energy Crisis Relief Act

hr91-113.official_title: To extend the supplemental security income benefits program to Guam, the United States Virgin Islands, and American Samoa.

hr90-113.official_title: To enhance Federal enforcement of hate crimes, and for other purposes.
hr90-113.short_title: David Ray Hate Crimes Prevention Act of 2013
